message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500.  It's a great deal and a valuable asset.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $8000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While $8000 is lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to come down to $8500 to see if we can reach an agreement.  This is my final offer, so let me know if you're interested.
